question: Which among the following imposition of tax duties was/ were recommended by James Wilson?
option2: License duties on trade and profession
explanation: James Wilson was a famous businessman and economist. He came to India during the reign of Lord Canning in the year 1859 and suggested the imposition of three taxes i.e. Income Tax, License duties on trade and profession, Excise duty on tobacco (Homegrown). After his death, his work was continued by Samuel Liang.
